Skill.label: Shield: CWDT, Immortal Call, Phase Run
Gloves: Ele Weakness, Arma Brand, Flame Dash

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
[3.10] Kay's Spectre Summoner | All Bosses | League Starter | Full Levelling Guide | HC | SSF
Full build guide: https://www.pathofexile.com/forum/view-thread/2181275
Youtube: http://youtube.com/KayGaming
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kayellapoe (I don't stream often, though)
--
This the is Base Build: League Start / SSF
This build is designed as a league starter and SSF build. It will take you from a fresh league start all the way to endgame bossing on cheap or self-crafted gear. It is focused on having high survivability while still having good DPS.
Required Uniques: none.
Since this is a league starter / ssf build, I've equipped the demo character with rare items that I self-crafted or picked up.
I have also included a 'maxed' set of equipment which is the best gear I have in standard (not including Synthesis gear).
Almost all gems are normal 20/20 gems. No Awakened Gems were used. Raise Spectre is level 21. Phase Run, but not level 20 because of low dexterity. You can keep Desecrate at level 1. It is only used for creating corpses. CWDT should be level 15 and Immortal Call should be level 16.
--
I recommend using LocalIdentity1's version of PoB: https://www.reddit.com/user/LocalIdentity1/
It has implemented support for Pledge of Hands, adjustable shock amount and other features not in the original PoB.
--
Skitterbot shock (18% for 20/20 gem) is not automatically calculated. Shock manually set to 18% in configuration (this only works for Localidentity1 PoB)
--
